dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6776 IH: Antisemitism Inclusion in DEI Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Torres of New York introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require a publicly traded company to disclose to the Securities and Exchange Commission if the company has a diversity, equity, and inclusion program to combat antisemitism.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Antisemitism Inclusion in DEI Act of 2023.

section.header: Disclosure of diversity, equity, and inclusion program to combat antisemitism
section.text: Section 13 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78m) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Disclosure of diversity, equity, and inclusion program To combat antisemitism
subsection.text: Each issuer required to file an annual report under subsection (a) shall disclose in that report if the issuer has a diversity, equity, and inclusion program that includes any initiative and training to combat antisemitism.
